experience: You and Mawulom both know Wayne Sutton, Jeremy Roberts, and 2 others
Medallia Scores 100% On Human Rights Campaign Corporate Equality Index - Medallia
Closing the Design Tools Gap – Rey Benoit – Medium
Active Engagements:-Patreon-NavaCompleted Engagements:-Thumbtack: April 2017 - October 2017 (7 months)

At Thumbtack I led a pod of 2 recruiters and 6 sourcers focused on hiring senior level front-end engineers while working on multiple D&I projects. To create an inclusive environments and grow our teams.
During my time at LinkedIn I was tasked with finding senior level engineering talent.

At Google I partnered with recruiting teams and hiring managers to generate ideas, leverage resources, and share information to facilitate an effective search for unique passive candidates. I also acted as a search expert for a functional area by understanding hiring needs, position specifications, and investigated new ideas to create innovative sourcing strategies. Sourcing passive candidates through complex boolean searches, networking, x-raying, tangent sourcing, open source contributions and research. Once sourced, I conducted preliminary phone interviews, assessing technical strengths to ensure qualifications are well matched with the position and Google’s hiring bar. I discovered and sought out the most talented software engineers, test engineers, and site reliability engineers in the world from hard-to-reach places, thus meeting or far exceeding quarterly targets.To conclude I provided an exceptional and unyielding candidate experience while delivering consistently high and measurable results.

Supported the Army's efforts to ensure Soldier survivability by providing Quality Engineering support for the U.S. Army Armament Research, Development and Engineering Center (ARDEC). Developed and maintained an open line of communication with 8A small business vendors and subcontractors, to successfully manage quality on a multi-million dollar contract.  Acted as a QA SME by providing policy interpretations and procedural guidance to develop standard processes and implement best practices. Assembled and led several Integrated Product Teams (IPT) tasked with identifying critical defects in contract manufacturing facilities.
Collateral Duty EEO Counselor - Tech Recruiter

Promoted diversity and inclusion in the federal government by serving as an Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) counselor while working with a team to facilitate inclusion training. I served as a technical recruiter, evangelizing the benefits of working for DoD at university events, and national diversity conventions.

Worked as a Quality Engineer for the U.S. Army Armament Research, Development and Engineering Center (ARDEC). During which I collaborated with cross-functional Improvised Product Teams (IPT) to meet schedules, conduct periodic visits to contractors at ISO 9001 compliant manufacturing facilities, and ensured compliance with specification requirements.
R&D CO-OP Knee Product Development Research and Development
New Jersey Institute of Technology, Newark, NJ

National Residence Hall Honorary, American Society of Quality Engineers, Equal Employment Opportunity Volunteer, Education Opportunity Program Student Organization, National Society of Black Engineers (NSBE), Biomedical Engineers Society, NJIT Ambassadors, National Deans List

Steven Pollock
Technical Recruiting at Thumbtack, Musician
July 5, 2017, Mawulom was senior to Steven but didn’t manage directly

Steven is one of the best technical sourcers I've worked with. For over a year in a half, I've watched and benefited from his erudition. He is creative, dependable, detail-oriented, responsive, thoughtful, and has a positive mental outlook. Constantly looking for opportunities to refine his craft. Due to his thoroughness, one of his biggest strength is his ability to write thoughtful compelling messages. He is praised by his teammates for identifying the right candidate's profiles and provides insights on sourcing strategy. Steven takes best practices and operationalizes them for messaging and uses a hands-on approach when coaching his colleagues. He has been a phenomenal sourcing partner to our team. His dedication and result-driven nature cause him to always pull through with extra effort as needed. During my tenure at Thumbtack Steven was not only a part of this team, but he was a top performer.P.S. Outside of recruiting, Steven is also a passionate musician
